trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions] Specifies whether transaction flow across thread continuations is enabled for <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: [.NET Framework 4.5.1 이상 버전에서 지원 됨] 에 대 한 스레드 연속 작업에서 트랜잭션 흐름을 사용할 것인지 지정 <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionScope"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption is configured in the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> overloads that take a TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption parameter.
trans-unit.target: TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption에 구성 된 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A>TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption 매개 변수를 사용 하는 오버 로드.</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suppress is the default setting if no TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption is specified.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하지 않는 없는 TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption 지정 된 경우 기본 설정입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that transaction flow across thread continuations is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 스레드 연속 작업에서 트랜잭션 흐름이 활성화 된을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that transaction flow across thread continuations is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 스레드 연속 작업에서 트랜잭션 흐름이 표시 되지 않는지를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the default setting if no TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption is specified in the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 없는 TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption에 지정 된 경우이 값은 기본 설정의 <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A>
